pullrequest.title: SVG support for arcs, disjoints paths and their triangulation / extrusion

content.raw:
It's true that we are breaking things here, but I am happy to add a new flag:
You are right about breaking things.
It seems that the new behavior is the "correct" one, and should be the new default (otherwise, we'll have to use this flag all the time from now on).
We are only breaking models with open path, existing models with closed paths are OK. I don't know how many models will affected, but I think the number is still relatively small.

What do you think?
